home.description: I design and develop digital experiences that feel natural, using design and code to create useful and intuitive websites for users.

project.title: Get To Know
project.prj1-desc: Planner App built with React, using Firebase and deployed on Vercel

about.title: About Me
about.text1: My name is Alexander Zunini, I am 25 years old and I’m from Montevideo, Uruguay.
about.text2: I completed my computer science studies and decided to continue self-taught, specializing in web development.
about.text3: I especially love Front End, where I enjoy combining logic with design to create attractive, functional, and well-structured web experiences.

contact.title: CONTACT ME
contact.desc: If you want to talk about projects, collaborations, or just connect, fill out the form and I’ll reply as soon as possible.
